description: I hate wasting perfectly good vegetables to make mushroom stockâ€”using kitchen scraps is a cheaper, less wasteful alternative!
keywords: how to make mushroom stock, how to make vegetable stock, Kitchen Scrap Mushroom Stock
name: Kitchen Scrap Mushroom Stock
recipeIngredient: 2 cup frozen vegetable scraps (onion and shallot skins, carrot and celery trimmings, etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in large Dutch oven or stock pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Simmer partially covered for 45 minutes; remove lid and simmer uncovered for 30 minutes more.
Allow stock to cool, then pour through a fine mesh strainer into a bowl. Press vegetable scraps against the strainer with a wooden spoon in order to extract as much stock as possible.
Discard solids and store stock in a plastic container or freezer bag.
